docs.snippet: Brazilian hackers are threatening to disrupt the World Cup with attacks ranging from jamming websites to data theft, adding cyber warfare to the list of challenges for a competition already marred by protests, delays and overspending....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazilian hackers are threatening to disrupt the World Cup with attacks ranging from jamming websites to data theft, adding cyber warfare to the list of challenges for a competition already marred by protests, delays and overspending.

headline.main: Hackers Target Brazil's World Cup for Cyber Attacks
headline.print_headline: Hackers Target Brazil's World Cup for Cyber Attacks
